SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Banishment
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Blight
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Confusion
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled actions.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Dimension Door
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Dominate Beast
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: You attempt to beguile a beast that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Greater Invisibility
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Ice Storm
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Polymorph
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Stoneskin
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone.

SorcererLevel4Spells.Name: Wall of Fire
SorcererLevel4Spells.Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range.
